item.title: Black Sabbath’s Geezer Butler Reflects on Band’s Final Rehearsals, Concert Before Ozzy Osbourne’s Death: He Was So “Frail”
item.description: “I didn’t realize then that I would never see Ozzy again after that night,” Butler writes of the July 5 “Back to the Beginning” show in England.

item.title: Black Sabbath’s Geezer Butler Reflects on Band’s Final Rehearsals, Concert Before Ozzy Osbourne’s Death: He Was So “Frail”
item.description: “I didn’t realize then that I would never see Ozzy again after that night,” Butler writes of the July 5 “Back to the Beginning” show in England.

item.title: Ozzy Osbourne, Black Sabbath Spotify Streams Spike Following Osbourne’s Death
item.description: Osbourne died on Tuesday at 76, just weeks after he and Black Sabbath performed at their farewell Back to the Beginning concert earlier in July.

item.title: Tony Iommi, Geezer Butler Mourn Death of Black Sabbath Co-Founder Ozzy Osbourne: “Lost Our Brother”
item.description: “It’s just such heartbreaking news that I can’t really find the words, there won’t ever be another like him,” Iommi said.
